gaps.reason: API rate limiting and permission issues prevented real-time data collection. Unauthenticated GitHub API has strict rate limits.
recommended_next_steps: Use authenticated GitHub API with personal access token (GITHUB_TOKEN)
Query GitHub GraphQL API for batch statistics in single request
Use GitHub CLI tool: gh repo view mimblewimble/grin --json stargazers,forks,updatedAt
Alternative: Parse GitHub web page HTML if API unavailable
gaps.impact: Repository activity metrics provide insight into project health and community engagement

gaps.reason: Web scraping tools unavailable due to permission restrictions. Need direct access to grin.mw website to extract official community links.
recommended_next_steps: Manual browser visit to https://grin.mw to extract official links
Check GitHub repository README at https://github.com/mimblewimble/grin/blob/master/README.md
Search for 'Grin cryptocurrency community' on known platforms (Telegram, Discord, Reddit)
Check Grin documentation site for community section
Use Archive.org Wayback Machine if current site inaccessible
gaps.impact: Community channels are essential for understanding project communication, governance, and user engagement

gaps.reason: GitHub API access blocked during research session. Unable to retrieve contributor statistics and core team information.
recommended_next_steps: Use authenticated GitHub API: GET /repos/mimblewimble/grin/contributors
Check GitHub Insights tab manually via browser
Review commit history for frequent contributors: git log --format='%an' | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn
Check Grin governance documentation for core team mentions
Search LinkedIn for 'Grin cryptocurrency developer'
gaps.impact: Understanding contributors helps assess project maintainability and decentralization of development

gaps.reason: Existing blockchain data is for an Ethereum token contract (0x7aaf799516404a8d69ef3f0b55746d15613ae04e), not the native Grin blockchain. Grin operates on its own independent chain using Mimblewimble protocol.
recommended_next_steps: Access Grin block explorer: https://grin.blockscan.com or https://grinscan.net
Query Grin node API directly if public nodes available
Check MimbleWimble Explorer for Grin chain data
Use Grin wallet API for chain statistics
Contact Grin community for recommended explorers
gaps.impact: Native blockchain metrics are crucial for understanding actual network activity, security, and adoption
gaps.notes: The Ethereum address found may be a wrapped token or bridge contract, not representative of native Grin activity

attempted_sources: Market data APIs (not attempted due to prior failures)
gaps.reason: Economic data requires access to market data APIs or blockchain explorers that were unavailable during research session.
recommended_next_steps: Query CoinGecko API: https://api.coingecko.com/api/v3/coins/grin
Query CoinMarketCap API (requires API key)
Check Grin documentation for emission schedule details
Query Grin blockchain explorer for supply data
Note: Grin has infinite supply with constant emission (no max supply)
gaps.impact: Economic data is useful for market analysis but not critical for privacy/technical assessment
gaps.notes: Grin uses a unique economic model with constant emission (1 GRIN per second), resulting in decreasing inflation rate over time

phase_1_immediate.description: Deploy agents with proper authentication to resolve high-priority gaps
